customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a muddler? Well, it turns out that not all of them are good. I bought 2 wooden muddlers on Amazon and by the second use (same night) they had developed serious splits. This is bad cosmetically but also for health because you are not supposed to wash the wooden ones. Anyway, the black plastic muddler works well, has enough length for tall mixing grasses, cleans easily and doesn’t add any off-taste. It cost more than many others, but it is worth it. I comes with a cardboard tube shipping box that is ok for storage. Now I must go to attend to my mint plants....
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mineo

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler for large glass water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I use this to muddle ginger for my ginger lemon water. I make it in a 32oz glass water bottle in the morning so I can carry it around and drink with ease. It’s super easy to stick the muddler into the opening of the glass mouth and I am able to grate the ginger directly into the container and muddle it in the bottle so I don’t lose any of those nutritious juices like I would if using a separate container to muddle, then poured the results into my bottle. I love that I can use less dishes to make my fancy water!

product_meta.title: Cocktail Muddler - Dishwasher Safe, Ergonomic Drink Muddler for Home bars and Professional Bartenders (Black, Plastic) - A Bar Above
product_meta.description:
Professional Grade Black Plastic Muddler

Designed by a career bartender for bartenders and serious cocktail enthusiasts. This cocktail muddler was created from scratch to be the most comfortable, durable and beautiful muddler available on the market. We designed it to solve all of our frustrations with the other muddlers we:
- It is extra long
- It has an ergonomic, comfortable handle
- It is made from food-safe, dishwasher safe polypropylene
- It has a flat end, perfect for muddling herbs and fruit alike.


Knuckle Friendly and Ergonomic

This muddler is meant to make your hand happy! First, it is extra long - so you won't bang your knuckles on the edge of the pint glass or cocktail shaker you are muddling in. Second, it has a rounded, ergonomic handle that's been custom designed to be the most comfortable muddler you've ever used. 


Food-Safe and Washable

Many wood muddlers have a lacquer finish which can chip off and contaminate your beverage. This muddler is made from safe and washable plastic. Throw it in the dishwasher without hesitation!


Don't Kill your Mint!

When muddling herbs, it's important to muddle gently to release the aroma without smashing too hard - as you will run the risk of turning your drink bitter. That's why you'll almost always see craft bartenders choosing muddlers with a flat end (without spikes). The flat end is the best way to release the beautiful aroma in mint and fruit alike - without releasing bitterness instead.


Choose the muddler that's been shaped from years behind a craft cocktail bar. You'll love the comfortable handle and beautiful hardwood style that are perfect for busy commercial bars and home bars alike.
feature_bullets: EXTRA LONG: No more banging your knuckles on the side of the shaker or pint glass! This muddler is a full 12” long - big enough to keep your hands out of the mess and away from sharp edges.

FLAVOR & AROMA: Don’t kill your mint! This muddler does not have sharp points on the muddling end because they often cause muddled mint and herbs to turn bitter. Our flat end is exactly what craft bartenders prefer to bring out the best aromatics without ruining your cocktail with bitterness.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Designed for ergonomics, comfort and quality, this muddler was created from scratch by a career bartender to reduce hand stress and give the most comfortable muddling experience possible. Even the busiest bartender will love making Mojitos with this muddler!
SAFE & WASHABLE: Made from food-safe, durable and dishwasher-safe Polypropylene, this muddler will withstand years of use and abuse, even in the busiest bar.

VERSATILE & DURABLE: This is no skinny muddler! Designed for comfort and built to last, this will be the last muddler you ever buy. It’s the perfect choice for your Mojito, Sazerac, Caipirinha or Julep, and will help you make delicious cocktails for years to come!
